item.description: 报错如下 $ ./mysqld 2017-03-23 08:42:32 1358 [ERROR] InnoDB: Attempted to open a previously opened tablespace. Previous tablespace mysql/slave_relay_log_info uses space ID: 3 at filepath: ./mysql/slave_relay_log_info.ibd.
